name: query_transacciones
description: Executes an SQL query on the transactions table ('afflux_transacciones_mv').

q.description: The SQL query to be executed.

afterdate.description: Transactions dated on or after the specified date.

assettype.description: One or more asset types separated by '|'.

beforedate.description: Transactions dated on or before the specified date.

buyer.description: One or more buyers separated by '|'.

district.description: District where the transaction took place.

m30.description: M30 value related to the transaction.

municipality.description: Municipality where the transaction took place.

neighborhood.description: Neighborhood where the transaction took place.

seller.description: One or more sellers separated by '|'.
